meanings.definition: A cosmetic powder or cream applied to the eyelids to enhance or alter the appearance of the eyes.
meanings.sent1: She bought new eyeshadows to create a dramatic look for the party.
meanings.sent2: I like to experiment with different eyeshadows to match my outfits.
meanings.sent3: Her collection of eyeshadows is so vast, she could open a store!
meanings.sent4: The colorful eyeshadows painted her eyelids like a vibrant canvas.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering eyeshadows made her eyes sparkle like jewels.

meanings.sent1: She organized her eyeshadows neatly in a makeup drawer.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on various eyeshadows from different brands.
meanings.sent3: His obsession with collecting eyeshadows was getting out of hand.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with eyeshadows of all colors, creating a rainbow effect.
meanings.sent5: The eyeshadows on the shelf seemed to whisper to her, each with its own story.
